description: Try our easy to follow Rhubarb, Strawberry & Apple Strudel recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rhubarb, Strawberry & Apple Strudel Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 stalk rhubarb, trimmed, cut into 2cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper.
Place rhubarb and strawberries on 1 tray. Sprinkle with half the sugar. Bake for 20 minutes or until soft. Drain fruit and transfer to a bowl. Reserve syrup in a separate bowl.
Place apples in a sieve, pressing with paper towel to remove excess liquid. Add to rhubarb mixture with 1/2 cup breadcrumbs, custard powder and remaining sugar. Stir to combine.
Place 1 pastry sheet on a clean work surface. Cover remainder with a damp tea towel to prevent pastry drying out. Spray with oil and sprinkle with 2 tsp remaining breadcrumbs and continue layering.

Spoon rhubarb mixture along one long edge of pastry, leaving a 5cm border along shorter ends. Fold short ends in and roll up to enclose filling. Place strudel, seam-side down, on remaining tray. Spray top with oil.
Bake for 30 minutes or until pastry is crisp and golden. Cool strudel on tray for 5 minutes. Dust with icing sugar, slice and serve with reserved syrup and extra strawberries.
